text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, a company or firm shall be licensed by the Commission before the company or firm provides mold remediation services in the State.

section.section: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall meet the requirements of this subtitle.
If the applicant is a company or firm, the company or firm shall appoint a company or firm member as a representative member to make the application on behalf of the company or firm.
